website_summaries.verdict: Offers multiple setup options to give you just the right audio layout for the size of room.
pros: Smart dual speaker design that allows you to place the 2 main speakers in a left/right configuration or in a front/back configuration for optimal layout in the room
Also includes a separate wireless subwoofer
Has an HDMI input for cabled connectivity
Includes Bluetooth connection option for streaming music
cons: A bit more complex than other soundbar systems

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another one in a NY minute.
customer_reviews.text: I do like my soundbar. This is not ultra hi-fi, but it works for my living room. My LR and kitchen are adjoining rooms. I daily turn on iHeart radio on my smart LG tv and listen to music. The Bluetooth subwoofer is nice because I have it across the room sitting on the bottom of a bookshelf. Very subtle - just needs an electrical outlet. The soundbar integrates with my TV and turns on with the TV. It doesn't turn off with it though?? It came with all mounting hardware and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: V. Finch

customer_reviews.title: The sound from this unit is exceptional for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound from this unit is exceptional for the price. Matched with my LG TV and a SONY BluRay with WiFi ans Bluetooth, watching broadcast TV, movies and listening to Pandora or my own downloads is outstanding entertainment. In retrospect, I should have bought this unit in the first place rather than the one i did at one of the big membership wholesale stores. Really, the quality of the sound reproduction rivals that of models costing two to three times as much.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Old Chief

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly versatile product
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly versatile product. Have been using it to connect my laptop and android phone (bluetooth), the tv (optical), and the xBox almost daily for over a month now. They all work great! The sound quality is very good for a rather small soundbar and subwoofer. No issues pairing the bar with the subwoofer, they got automatically connected right out from the box and have been working properly ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Juan D Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar with EQ control and HDMI in/out
customer_reviews.text: After trying another more expensive soundbar that I returned for distorted sound, I am very happy with this product. It gets a good sound for the size, and offers a range of preset EQ settings, along with manual control over bass, treble, and subwoofer levels. Also has HDMI in and out, which not all soundbars include. Also very reasonable price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Brainless Installation!
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday for my Sony LED and loved the installation. Just plug in, set the TV to "audio system," and it was good to go. Unlike other sound bars I've purchased, there was no synching with the remote control or anything else like that. Completely brainless and it took 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: We love this sound bar
customer_reviews.text: We love this sound bar! Use in a medium sized living room and works great! We should have bought one sooner, makes a huge different in sound on our LG TV! One problem though we could not get it to work with our HDMI cable then realize we had to use a specific HDMI cable! Also had to download manual online to fix issue with speaker and bluetooth connectivity but once resolved, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: I loved this at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first. It made the neighbors I hated complain which is what I wanted it for lol. Lots of power for sure. But after a few weeks the sleepover started cutting out. When I'm listening to music the sub woofer kicks on and off and I can't seem to fix it. :( anyways it did it the day after the return window closed. So i recommend the warranty for sure. If the sub woofer wasn't messing up this unit would be perfect. This is the third one I had and none of them lasted more than a few weeks. Maybe I'm just cursed.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley K.

customer_reviews.title: The subwoofer would also constantly lose connection with the soundbar and it resulted in some annoying audio experiences
customer_reviews.text: The soundbar is okay for the price I suppose but the sound was never that clear - especially when people were talking (in tv). The subwoofer would also constantly lose connection with the soundbar and it resulted in some annoying audio experiences. I'd suggest that if you are in this price range already, invest a little more, and wait for one of the really nice sound bars to go on sale. I ended up getting a Sony HT-CT770 for about $250 and it is WAY better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: MSrin

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought this sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Connected to my TV via an optical cable and the sound is great. It was easy to pair to my phone and play music via the sound system. Sometimes the bass is a little too much but I have not played around with the settings that much. You could easily spend hundreds of dollars more and get little in additional performance.
customer_reviews.author: bigpops

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to understand as it does not have good acoustics design
customer_reviews.text: This slim design. meaning that it is only 2 to 3 inches high, It is hard to understand as it does not have good acoustics design, conversations sound to be running together and distorted.it appears that it lacks mid range freqs. The Woofer included does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael  Sanso

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar is awesome! It makes my tv sound like a movie ...
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is awesome! It makes my tv sound like a movie theater. I will never go without a sound bar ever again. I also stream music from my iPod through this bar and it sounds great! Who needs a stereo when you have this? I highly recommend this sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: CodysDad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, linked to my LG 4K TV with no problem, sounds much better than the TV alone.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick W Richey, Jr

customer_reviews.title: ... now and it was simple to install and sounds great. You have to set the wireless sub woofer ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had my sound bar over a month now and it was simple to install and sounds great. You have to set the wireless sub woofer across the room to get the full effects of a movie theater sound. Other than that, I love it and would recommend this sound bar for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Simple hookup (w/ included optical cable). Using auto on-off feature and TV remote volume/mute control. Great sound and effects. Bluetooth'd some tunes from my android phone, quick/easy. Sleek design. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN G GAMMON

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Sitting 10 feet away from the bar I had to turn the volume up high to hear what was being said. Not as good as I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great integration with my LG OLED tv. Best sound for my money compared to similar ones. Looks great with my current audio/video equipment.
customer_reviews.author: bobcooke

customer_reviews.title: Exellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: Finally can hear how programs should sound! This was simple to set up especially with LG tv. Wireless subwoofer is awesome. Just watching basketball and every bounce of the ball is heard. WOW! Feels more like being courtside. Plenty loud enough to fill a large great room with sound. I'm not an audiophile but for this price who can argue. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: This was my second sound bar and it stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my second sound bar and it stopped working within 1 month. I will NEVER buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Skiles

customer_reviews.title: LG Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and easy to install. It has great sound and works well with my television.
customer_reviews.author: George L. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the package. Syncs with lg tv. Poor blue tooth range.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: we love it. The sound is good on
customer_reviews.text: We've had this product for a few months now, we love it. The sound is good on it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: HAS A GREAT SOUND AND MAKES TV MORE FUN TO WATCH.
customer_reviews.author: DALE GORTON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great and the price was perfect it arrived in 2 hours to using Amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: Trustno1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Installation was very easy and the sound is crystal clear. Kids love the Bluetooth feature to stream your own song selections. Great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Solano

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, tiny bar
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound even for a small living area. Being able to control equalization is great when switching between TV, movies, music and even audio books. Low profile and sleek, modern look is very aesthetically pleasing as well as space saving.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Snipes

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily and has good sound. I particularly like the feature where an additional amplifier is not needed. You have a simple HDMI in and out connection and the sound bar "plucks" the audio from the signal sending the video on to the TV. I use it on my boat where the Roku goes directly to it and form the sound bar on to the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Heape

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this sound bar. Sound quality is great. Synchronize easily with LG television.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound !!!! What a difference in the additional sound !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a great sound bar...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This sound bar is awesome! That's all I can say. I just got it today and watched terminator and I am blown away! If you are on a budget, this package is an insane deal! Great job by LG on this sound bar...WOW
customer_reviews.author: SmOkEd OuT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome just plain Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sound bar I have ever owned I always have to tell my wife to turn it down I have my main TV connected to my Bose soround sound and this sounds better I will order another set thank you
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible unit
customer_reviews.text: It is just noisy and loud enough. Even though you can control the highs, mid and lows, it changes nothing it sounds like a mash of noise..not clean. Increasing the sub-woofer makes it worse. Lastly, on some shows it has only played the music and not the vocals.
customer_reviews.author: Nehru

customer_reviews.title: Don' t waste your time or money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off it's only getting 1 star because there is no option for 0. I'm on my second one and the ARC does not work on either. Plugged both into two other TV's that have competitor sound bars connected via ARC and nada. LG customer service has no explanation or solution . DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Boom For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: After trying Sony, Vizio and even a $300 Samsung soundbar finally this one delivers. I'm tired of all these soundbars coming with decent size woofers that don't bump. This one does. Also comes with HDMI which you will pay $100 extra for one with Samsung's model. Perfect height. Not too tall like vizios which are decent but cover the sensor on my TV. Design is good. Only mesh on the woofer. I got this model for $129 at Walmart but just had to come here to gush about it.
customer_reviews.author: KmyJelly

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong For The $$$$
customer_reviews.text: This is the second LG sound bar I have purchased (one For Me and One for My Daughter). This is the best system I've owned and listened to. their Simple to hookup and to use. I HIGHLY!!! recommend this unit or any of the LG Sound bar's you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Lacks full range of sound.
customer_reviews.text: The sound Bar works great, however the sub woofer is almost non existing, as almost no sound comes out of it. Total sound is clear but is lacking in base notes and richness. I could not recommend it for anyone who would like to hear the full range of music. It did work well with the controls of my LG tv.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It brought my 60 inch flat screen with a flat sound alive.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the sound bar at the advice of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sound bar at the advice of my boyfriend. I'm a bit technology challenged and have had a hard time adjusting to the different remotes and changing of input, etc. It has increased the volume of my television, which was the reason I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

product_meta.title: LG Electronics LAS450H Sound Bar (2015 Model)
